title: Chest of Drawers (Three) with Bookcase
medium:
Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
description:
Scale: 1"-1'

Wide three-drawer chest with left side curved base and drawers joined to three lower shelves of four-shelf bookcase. Drawers have long, narrow pulls extending approximately one quarter in from left edge to right edge of chest.
name: Drawing
